text: WMUM may refer to either of two Georgia Public Broadcasting stations licensed to Cochran and serving the Macon area: *WMUM-TV, a television station broadcasting on channel 29 (formerly WDCO-TV) *WMUM-FM, a radio station broadcasting on FM 89.7 (formerly WDCO-FM) Other uses: *WRMF, an FM station in Palm Beach, Florida, which used the call letters WMUM until 1973
title: WMUM
